class NAPLAN_object(BaseOEAModule):
    def __init__(self, source_folder='NAPLAN', pseudonymize = True):
        BaseOEAModule.__init__(self, source_folder, pseudonymize)

        self.schemas['NaplanData'] = [
                                        ['SkPersistentStudentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CampusName', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CalendarYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentFirstName', 'string', 'hash'],
                                        ['StudentSurname', 'string', 'hash'],
                                        ['Test', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Score', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['PreviousBand', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band', 'string', 'no-op']                                                                 
                                        ]

        self.schemas['NaplanNational'] = [
                                        ['CalendarYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Test', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AverageScoreNational', 'double', 'no-op']                                                               
                                        ]

        self.schemas['NaplanNationalAverage'] = [
                                        ['Year', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Year Level', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Score', 'float', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Test', 'string', 'no-op']                                                             
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResults'] = [
                                        ['SKMySchoolsNAPLANResults', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKMySchoolsNAPLANResults', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCalendarYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCampus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKNaplanAssessment', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ICSEACode', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['MeanNAPLANScore', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SchoolMeanMarginLower', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SchoolMeanMarginUpper', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band1Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band2Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band3Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band4Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band5Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band6Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band7Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band8Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band9Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Band10Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ParticipationRate', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AssessedPercentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ExemptPercentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AbsentPercentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['WithdrawnPercentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['NationalMeanNAPLANScore', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ColourComparisontoNationalMean', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ComparisontoNationalMeanDescription', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsMeanNAPLANScore', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ColourComparisontoSimilarSchoolsMean', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ComparisontoSimilarSchoolsMeanDescription', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['StudentCount', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LocationId', 'integer', 'no-op']                                                            
                                        ]

        self.schemas['DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools'] = [
                                        ['SKMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCalendarYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKCampus', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKNaplanAssessment', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ICSEACode', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsMeanNAPLANScore', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsSchoolMeanMarginLower', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsSchoolMeanMarginUpper', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand1Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand2Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand3Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand4Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand5Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand6Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand7Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand8Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand9Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SimilarSchoolsBand10Percentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'integer', 'no-op']                                                            
                                        ]

                                 

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'NaplanData', self.schemas['NaplanData'], None, 'SkPersistentStudentId')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'NaplanNational', self.schemas['NaplanNational'], None, 'CalendarYear')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'NaplanNationalAverage', self.schemas['NaplanNationalAverage'], None, 'Year')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResults', self.schemas['DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResults'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKMySchoolsNAPLANResults')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools', self.schemas['DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools')


        self.schemas['DMFactNAPLANACARABands'] = [
                                        ['SKNaplanAcaraBands', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BKNaplanAcaraBandsId', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKStateTerritory', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKYearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKNaplanAssesmentId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['SKExamBandId', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AverageAge', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearsOfSchooling', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ParticipationRate', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Exempt', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['BandPercentage', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['NationalMinimumStandard', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['NationalMinimumStandardCI', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['MeanScale', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['MeanScaleCI', 'double', 'no-op'],
                                        ['NotStatedPercentage', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['CreateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['LastUpdateDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveStartDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['EffectiveEndDate', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['IsCurrent', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['ScdReason', 'string', 'no-op']                                                              
                                        ]

        self.schemas['NaplanNational'] = [
                                        ['CalendarYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Test', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AverageScoreNational', 'double', 'no-op']                                                               
                                        ]

        self.schemas['NaplanNational'] = [
                                        ['CalendarYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Test', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AverageScoreNational', 'double', 'no-op']                                                               
                                        ]

        self.schemas['NaplanNational'] = [
                                        ['CalendarYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Test', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AverageScoreNational', 'double', 'no-op']                                                               
                                        ]

        self.schemas['NaplanNational'] = [
                                        ['CalendarYear', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['YearLevel', 'integer', 'no-op'],
                                        ['Test', 'string', 'no-op'],
                                        ['AverageScoreNational', 'double', 'no-op']                                                               
                                        ]

    def ingest(self):
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactNAPLANACARABands', self.schemas['DMFactNAPLANACARABands'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKNaplanAcaraBands')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'NaplanNational', self.schemas['NaplanNational'], None, 'CalendarYear')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'NaplanNationalAverage', self.schemas['NaplanNationalAverage'], None, 'Year')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResults', self.schemas['DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResults'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKMySchoolsNAPLANResults')
        oea.ingest_delta_data(self.source_folder, 'DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools', self.schemas['DMFactMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools'], 'LastUpdateDate', 'SKMySchoolsNAPLANResultsSimilarSchools')






naplan_object = NAPLAN_object()
